definition: (neologism) (of movies, songs etc) affecting/touching/moving/(of a person, esp. a woman) charming/cool
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise
to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~
(neologism c. 2014) irresistibly quirky/compelling in its wackiness
(slang) come on, you can't deny it!/don't you think so?!/(melodramatic form of 有沒有|有没有)
unwell/indisposed/out of sorts/euphemism or honorific for ill
to work as a carter or porter/to transport goods for a living (esp. by donkey)
to satisfy a craving/to get a kick out of sth/gratifying/immensely enjoyable/satisfying/fulfilling
lit. just the right flavor/just right/just the thing/excellent
visually attractive/eye candy/easy on the eyes/to protect the eyes
